newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan stocks close up on blue chip buying.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan stocks close up on blue chip buying.

text.p: Pakistani stocks closed higher on Friday mainly on buying of blue chip Hub Power and telecom utility PTCL shares, but dealers said overall sentiment remained mixed ahead of the Saturday-Sunday weekend.
"There appears to be genuine buying in Hub Power shares, while PTCL gained on speculative activity," dealer Usma Shoaib said. "But there was not much activity in other stocks.
The index rose 7.28 points, or 0.46 percent, to end at 1,594.38. Gainers led losers 108 to 98. Hub Power rose 0.30 rupees to 41.55 and PTCL 0.55 to 31.50.
